subject: College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The former Florida and Bethune-Cookman player Avery Atkins was found dead in his car in the garage of his aunt’s home in what the police called a suspicious death.Atkins, 20, was a freshman cornerback on the 2005 Gators and was projected to start on the 2006 team, the eventual national champion. He was released from his scholarship last summer by Florida Coach Urban Meyer because of a domestic battery charge against him. He joined Bethune-Cookman as a transfer and played in three games before being released from his scholarship.
